env.CORS_ALLOW_METHODS: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'https://code.jquery.com'; style-src 'self' 'https://book-m-searcher-online.vercel.app' 'https://fonts.googleapis.com'; font-src 'self' 'https://fonts.gstatic.com'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.vercel.app; frame-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
